name: Our Path Unbeaten
description:
The year is 2545AD, society is dead and humanity's layered city-scapes lay in ruins. In their shadow stands Maja and Silva, members of a struggling expeditionary force. Guide them through multiple 2D, open-world levels and collect the engine pieces needed to escape their urban purgatory.

========================================================

Our Path Unbeaten was initially created to show the attendees of ExpoTees 2022 and was received well enough that I decided to release it to the public.

(I don't like asking for money for such small things but I have a humble Uni student. If you can, please throw us a bone and donate! -Emily)
